languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько часов у вас болит горло, а скрип пера по пергаменту стал неуловимо-жалобным. Кажется, перерыв нужен и вам, и священной машине.{/n}
{n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько часов у вас болит горло, а скрип пера по пергаменту стал неуловимо-жалобным. Кажется, перерыв нужен и вам, и священной машине.{/n}

{n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数時間たつと、喉が痛くなった。羊皮紙の上で羽ペンがきしむ音には、わずかに悲しげな響きが加わっている。あなたも聖なる機械も、休息を必要としているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数時間たつと、喉が痛くなった。羊皮紙の上で羽ペンがきしむ音には、わずかに悲しげな響きが加わっている。あなたも聖なる機械も、休息を必要としているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere Stunden später ist deine Kehle trocken, und das Kratzen der Schreibfeder auf dem Pergament hat einen entfernt traurigen Unterton angenommen. Anscheinend benötigen sowohl du als auch die heilige Maschinen eine Pause.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere Stunden später ist deine Kehle trocken, und das Kratzen der Schreibfeder auf dem Pergament hat einen entfernt traurigen Unterton angenommen. Anscheinend benötigen sowohl du als auch die heilige Maschinen eine Pause.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au bout de plusieurs heures, vous avez la voix enrouée et une certaine tristesse semble émaner de chaque crissement de la plume sur le parchemin. Il semblerait que la machine sacrée et vous ayez besoin de faire une pause.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de plusieurs heures, vous avez la voix enrouée et une certaine tristesse semble émaner de chaque crissement de la plume sur le parchemin. Il semblerait que la machine sacrée et vous ayez besoin de faire une pause.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varias horas después, tienes la garganta irritada y el rascado de la pluma sobre el pergamino suena con un deje apesadumbrado. Parece que tanto tú como la sagrada máquina necesitáis un descanso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varias horas después, tienes la garganta irritada y el rascado de la pluma sobre el pergamino suena con un deje apesadumbrado. Parece que tanto tú como la sagrada máquina necesitáis un descanso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几个小时过去了，你的喉咙疼了起来。羽毛笔在羊皮纸上发出的咯吱声，似乎也带上了几分哀伤之意。看来，无论是你，还是这台神圣机器，都需要好好休息一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几个小时过去了，你的喉咙疼了起来。羽毛笔在羊皮纸上发出的咯吱声，似乎也带上了几分哀伤之意。看来，无论是你，还是这台神圣机器，都需要好好休息一下。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saat sonra boğazın konuşmaktan acıyor, parşömene değen kalemin çıkardığı ses de acıklı bir hâl alıyor. Anlaşılan hem senin hem de kutsal makinenin ara vermesi gerek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several hours later, your throat is sore, and the creaking of the quill on the parchment has taken on a faintly sad undertone. It seems both you and the sacred machine are in need of a break.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saat sonra boğazın konuşmaktan acıyor ve parşömene değen kalemin çıkardığı ses acıklı bir hâl alıyor. Anlaşılan hem senin hem de kutsal makinenin ara vermesi gerek.{/n}
